author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Ready to get your sip on? üòâ The Olive Garden drink menu is where the party starts! It‚Äôs not just about what you eat, it's about finding that perfect drink to complete the vibe. Whether you're here for the legendary, bottomless Raspberry Lemonade that everyone talks about, or you're looking for a freshly brewed iced tea or a rich Lavazza espresso to finish your meal, they've got a sip for every occasion. Let's dive into all the delicious drink options for 2025! üöÄ

NON-ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES.description: Not drinking? No problem! From their famous bottomless lemonades and iced teas to Italian-style espressos and cappuccinos, these non-alcoholic superstars are here to save the day. So refreshing! ‚ú®

items.name: Gallon Iced Teas & Raspberry Lemonade
items.review: Hosting a party? Be the hero and bring a gallon of this liquid gold. Your friends will thank you. Trust.

items.name: Raspberry Lemonade
items.review: So refreshing! üçã The perfect balance of sweet and tart. It's the ultimate thirst quencher. Plus, it's bottomless. What's not to love? ü•§

items.question: Does the Olive Garden Drink menu have free refills?
items.answer: You know it! ‚úÖ Olive Garden hooks you up with FREE refills on all their soft drinks, lemonades, teas, and even the 'Caff√® la Toscana'. Drink up!

items.question: What non-alcoholic drinks are on the menu?
items.answer: Tons! You can grab Italian Bottled Water if you're feeling fancy, or go for their legendary Raspberry Lemonade, Classic Lemonade, Iced Teas, and all the usual fountain drinks. ü•§

items.question: Are there kid-friendly drinks at Olive Garden?
items.answer: Of course! The little ones are covered with options like Milk, Fruit Juices, and yummy Lemonade. They won't be left out of the fun. üôå
